string.text: Look at yourself. Aren't you tired of being a nobody, without a real group of people always backing you up? Join us, and you will have a real name and longer life.

How does it feel to be a rat at the bottom of the food chain, always picking up the scraps? Look at your shitty equipment. Look at the people around you, always ready to stab your back. Join us and you might actually have a chance.
Do you really want to spend your short life on living in the swamps, among a bunch of mutated pigs and shit? Your people will never achieve anything at this rate. Join us instead.
Don't you see that your government gives zero shits about you? You are just a pawn in this chess game. Begin thinking for yourself, join us.
Is this the freedom you wanted? Bleeding to death, away from any friends? Your people are a bunch of incompetent druggies, barely able to save themselves. Join us and live longer.

Convert NPCs
Convert NPCs To Your Faction
Enable random chance to decline your offer.
If turned off, all npcs will have a 100% chance to accept your offer.

The formula used to calculate the chances is:
[Player's rank intimidation] - [Enemy's rank intimidation] + [Base chance] = [Chance to convert]%
If your intimidation is 20, npc's intimidation is 10, and base chance is 30, the end result will be: 20 - 10 + 30 = 40% chance to convert
 
If you don't want to use rank chance modifiers, just set all ranks' strength to 0 and the script will use the Base chance for everything
Base chance
This number is always added after subtracting npc intimidation from player intimidation.
Attack chance on failure
Chance of npc immediately standing up and attacking you upon failure to convert. Always the same chance. No other modifiers.
